Name: BATTLE GEAR
About the game: -Battle Gear is a single-play FPS genre.- One day, a meteorite that fell on Earth, was acquired by American pharmaceutical company RabbitLab, and over time, an unknown zombie disaster occurred in RabbitLab, hitting the mainland of the United States. The government has lost its function, and survivors have fled to sea in ships under the direction of the UN The threat of zombies, and unidentified enemies trying to retrieve the meteorite that is responsible for the zombie disaster! Pioneer the future with all the means and methods available. Powerful and terrifying enemies! Rescue the survivors and some of them will fight for you together. Human followers will help you summon Battle Gear, the most powerful means available only to you. Feel the pleasure of crushing enemies with followers and many weapons Artificial intelligence from enemies who are neither smart nor stupid! Breathtaking battles and the fun of gathering hidden followers! Unnecessary foreign language skills! (Most of the in-game stories are done with cinematic movies and picture explanations.)
